website_summaries.verdict: A solid board that can stand a lot of abuse at a very good price.
pros: Low price point for a board that generally holds up well
Great customer service from the seller
A good kids' board, but also works well for adults
Fast and works well for a small person
cons: The bottom layer has a tendency to separate when the board goes bad

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the good reviews it has but those must all be fake. The item i received was nowhere near worth the price. The reason I ordered this was because of the quality(turns out there is none). I have nothing against using a cheap body board from CVS ( that's what I ended up buying anyways because I returned this item) but when I am paying a substantial amount for a body board, I expect it to be better quality than the one I bought at the drug store. This material is so cheap. NOT WORTH THE PRICE. this is a great board to use if it was only $10, but not for anything more.
customer_reviews.author: Inge Frey

customer_reviews.title: The board held up nicely and the quality was great
customer_reviews.text: I am a 215lb man and went to Daytona beach for 4 days and I rode waves everyday. Several hours at that. The board held up nicely and the quality was great.
customer_reviews.author: jason baker

customer_reviews.title: Even held our beverages
customer_reviews.text: Paying as much as I did for the product, I had high expectation. Those expectations were met. This board is solid. It's made of good material and upheld well against much abuse. Took this thing on two beach vacations so far, and there is no sign of deterioration or excessive wear. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Morales

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed but it was such a pain to get in ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a long and complicated delivery because the first one was "lost" somewhere, which I guess happens. Then we get it and bring it to the beach and the FIRST day the bottom plastic part is totally separated from the foam part. So disappointed but it was such a pain to get in the first place so don't even want to begin thinking about replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: jagfamily6

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 body boards, one of each size for my son and daughter for a beach vacation. I thought I was purchasing a quality board that could be used for a few seasons as would be reflected in the price. My son used it literally one day and the back plastic veneer came off rendering the board worthless. In hindsight, I would buy the $15 boards at the beach and save the packing.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Winglosky

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 14 year old before spending a week at the beach. This is better quality than a lot of boogie boards, the bottom has a plastic lining which is makes it last longer and seems to "boogie" better than the cheaper foam ones we used in the past. I purchased 3, one for each son, and they are all still one piece after 6 full days of use.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor lover

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Took these on my beach vacation and after a week of hard use and my kids dragging and sitting on them they are still intact. I wont have to purchase new one's for next year so I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: Don't wast your money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice item but overly priced. I this for my grandson for our Florida vacation. I could have gotten one similar for $8.99. To expensive. Don't waste your money! Buy somewhere else!
customer_reviews.author: Marinemom

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Such a disappointment. For the price I didnt expect it to last less than 4 months. Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT BOOGIES
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC! My hubby and I took this to Zuma beach and had a blast. These boards are wonderful, light, good strap, handle really well on the water due to the smooth bottom. I expect they will last for years to come for us.
customer_reviews.author: Maren E Haugen

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until it fell apart after 2 and a half months with little use.
customer_reviews.author: emily rand

customer_reviews.title: lightweight light duty bodyboard for the little ones
customer_reviews.text: Really light, enough so smaller younger kids can handle it. The stiffness is there but I doubt this would be suitable for an adult for regular use more than a season prob bc the foam material that I'm guessing is what ice boxes and cheap surfboards are made from. Kids should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: CXK

customer_reviews.title: NO LEASH!!! -- Very Dangerous! -- False Advertising!
customer_reviews.text: I paid for TWO of these boogie boards, from Bo-Toys, that SAYS in print that it, "comes with a leash to attach to your wrist". But there IS NO LEASH WITH EITHER ONE. What kind of seller does this? You can't buy a boogie board, for a 12 year old's birthday present, without a leash. Especially in Hawaii. Leashes can prevent DROWNING. This is very dishonest and even more dangerous. I would not recommend this company, Bo-Toys, and their false advertising, whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: VT Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old had a blast with it at the beach. Holding up very well so far!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Solid board for solid fun
customer_reviews.text: This was a purchase for my 6 year old son. He swan in the ocean for ours. Then drug it all over the beach and used it as a sled for collected treasures. The line and the wristband are flimsy. If I can replace that, I will. But he’s happy, so I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Swan

customer_reviews.title: Careful if wearing a one piece suit.
customer_reviews.text: Board was very functional and did it's job riding the waves on the beach. The only negative is the lime green paint rubbed off on the skin of our daughter. If she had a one piece, that would of been a bummer. The paint easily came off with make up remover.
customer_reviews.author: JRT lover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent if you aren't gigantically huge like me
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a beginner. Must note, if you're taller or heavy like me, you probably won't be catching waves with this model as I'm sitting way low in the water. My friends were able to catch some waves though. My kids also loved taking their turn riding on it. Not sure if it matters, I'm 6'7" and 340lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Noir Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Durable plastic bottom-- seems well-built.
customer_reviews.text: This one was much better than another brand I got for my son-- it has a hard plastic bottom that seems durable. The other one I bought for my son had a sticker for the bottom. This board is what I was expecting for the price-- so be careful for others that aren't durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse W

customer_reviews.title: No strap
customer_reviews.text: Very upset with this purchase. I promised my child I would get a board before we leave for the beach and specifically checked to make sure it comes with a strap for the board so it wouldn’t float away, upon arrival there was no strap. Extremely disappointing. Will be returning this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S c

customer_reviews.title: Board string ripped right through the board after 10 waves.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited on my way to the beach to use my new body board. It’s cool looking and seemed durable when I received it, but when I was riding on the board the waves pushed me off. The string ripped right through the board and sliced it almost in half. I only rode about about 10 waves until it did that. These waves were nothing huge, just your regular Venice Beach waves.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling Toth

customer_reviews.title: Faded and bad velcro
customer_reviews.text: Updated: Velcro on the strap is not good and is already pretty useless after 4 beach trips. Also the red color has already faded to almost pink. Large bubble now starting on top. Bought a different brand board at the same time and it has no issues after same amount of use. This one was a waste of money sadly.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hallett

customer_reviews.title: Bubble's up if left on the beach face up
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 boards and both surfaces bubbled up under the heat of the sun. I turned them face down and put them back in the ocean to reduce the bubble, but this isn't something I should have to do if the board is made properly.... Fix your product!!! Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: C. Moniz

customer_reviews.title: It will dye you green
customer_reviews.text: The green decal wore off on my skin and swim suit when I got it wet. My stomach and arms were green. It had to be scrubbed off and required acetone to finish. Also ruined my swim suit.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Shortly after purchasing this body board (for $53), I found a VERY comparable one at Academy for $10. And the cheaper one worked great for out beach trip. I can’t speak to the durability or performance for this product because it was returned due to being overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Board works well; strap is flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The board is nice. The problem was that the wrist-strap/leash literally disintegrated after 3-4 uses. I alerted the seller and they were nice enough to send me another wrist-strap/leash. We'll see how long this one lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Hoonie Kang

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well-constructed board!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this board so my six-year-old daughter could have some fun in the ocean during our recent beach trip. The other family we went with last year had a couple body boards then and I think my daughter felt left out. Well, my daughter didn't use this board much but everyone else did, and it held up much better than the overpriced ones sold at the stores near the beach. Great product! I might buy a bigger one for myself the next time we go to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: DIDN'T LAST A DAY
customer_reviews.text: We have had grocery store boogie boards before - but as our kids get older we were looking for something more solid. So we spend extra money for this body board. Unfortunately, after just a few hours the bottom slick layer separated from the board. Very disappointing. Better off spending $8 on a cheap board - it will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 year old grandson and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Fine for the kids or novices from a quality and performance perspective and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: cjs

customer_reviews.title: The most popular pool toy
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing that dissatified us with the board. The grandchildren were waiting day by day for it. They tore open the box, grabbed it and headed for the pool. It's been the most coveted item! It's sturdy and colorful. I only wish I'd ordered more than one. I have 10 grand kids!
customer_reviews.author: Denise R. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Delaminated after only 2 months of occasional use
customer_reviews.text: My son was excited to have a new board. Great looking product, however after 2 months of occasional use it delaminated. Very disappointing especially since we took care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja T.

customer_reviews.title: Boogie board for kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids loves using this board in the ocean. I don’t think they came out one time while we were there. I gave the item a 4 for sturdiness and durability because the wrist strap and string that attach to the board were pretty cheap and it ended up with a small chunk taken out of it; however, for the price I really can’t complain too much. It did the job and will be around for next summers beach trips!
customer_reviews.author: Melysa Fregoni

customer_reviews.title: Has held up so far
customer_reviews.text: Have used it a bunch on Lake Michigan, so am not using it in salt water. Have definitely put it to use without any signs of deterioration this summer. I know other User experiences have been different, but so far, no signs of coming apart
customer_reviews.author: Orin

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for our family
customer_reviews.text: My family took them boogie boarding and they held up nicely. Last year we had purchased generic ones and they all broke by the end of the first day. These were great
customer_reviews.author: Greg C.

customer_reviews.title: Beach bonus!!
customer_reviews.text: My four year old is obsessed with his board!! He’s very rambunctious and the board is very sturdy and durable!! It’s so lightweight he can carry it all on his own. This made our beach adventure so much more fun!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Save your money not worth it
customer_reviews.text: My son is 11 yrs old has only used this board 8-12 times and had it 7.5 months already falling apart. The sides are ripped and it already bent. Do not buy this board.
customer_reviews.author: MagPie

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: Broke on first use. 5 yr old daughter got about an hour of use out of it before the top half ripped off. She was not rough with it and did not misuse it, it came apart on a routine wave ride.
customer_reviews.author: pat heddendorf

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as it should be for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for our outer banks beach trip. Day 1 of use, 20 minutes in and already there’s a bend on one of them. Paid good money for what I thought seemed to be a good product. Shame.
customer_reviews.author: NICHOLE

customer_reviews.title: This item wont disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Good buy good value. Happy with product Purchased as an up grade to 5 yo who likes to boogie board. The right kind of board makes all the difference. This product filled rhat ticket
customer_reviews.author: Llara Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Floats well. Not well made.
customer_reviews.text: It floats well and holds weight well. We’ve had it about a week and only been used 4 times and the wrap on the outside is already bubbling up :/
customer_reviews.author: Sueseiv

customer_reviews.title: Super bummed.
customer_reviews.text: There were peeling and cracking within one use. Super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: P.G.

customer_reviews.title: Only used it a couple times, but so far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Great size (it's the pretty much the "standard" size for an adult board). Not too expensive. Worked great the 2 or 3 times I used it!
customer_reviews.author: Romain G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for All Day Ocean Play!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 12 yo grandson for his first trip to the ocean. It was a huge hit for him and both his older sister and younger brother. Great memory maker.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Larck

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: only used a couple of times and the backing and sides are peeling off! Tried to glue it back and the styrofoam is little balls so there is nothing solid to adhere it too.....
customer_reviews.author: Martha Willett

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this product this was a gift for a 5 year old it lasted 3 used before covering of the styrofoam lifted rendering the board useless. Will never buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lemieux

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made product
customer_reviews.text: It is falling apart after 3 uses I bought it for my 7 year old son and the back came off and the sides also peeled off
customer_reviews.author: william j donohuemets1986

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: Just delivered today and within 15 mins at the beach, the strap broke.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Murphy

customer_reviews.title: The top is all bubbled after one use.
customer_reviews.text: The board is a nice size for my 5 year old, however one week into having it and only one beach trip the top is all bubbles up.
customer_reviews.author: Justin G Noss

customer_reviews.title: The size and weight is great. The strap's velcro makes it easy to stay ...
customer_reviews.text: The size and weight is great. The strap's velcro makes it easy to stay around wrist when in the water. We all used it from our 6-year-old to the adults and we all had fun!
customer_reviews.author: Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My kids love it and have so much fun in the water with this! Made very well and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Brown

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Board started to bubble after a couple of uses. Ended up returning. It was sturdy and fun otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: This product was definitely not the quality I was expecting! It is the same board that you can buy from Five Below.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Guidry

customer_reviews.title: Best board for the price
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this board for a week long Family reunion vacation. At the end of the week this board was still in great shape, well after several other types of boards were broke in half. All the kids were rough on the boards, and we didn’t expect any to survive, but we ended up bringing this one home in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn R.

customer_reviews.title: They love them!
customer_reviews.text: Great body board! Bought 4 of them for Grandkids as Easter gifts...(the Easter Bunny brings them plenty of candy). We just moved to a private lake community and are at the beach several times a week. The boards have held up beautifully even under the 'pressure' of mud fights and general rough housing. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: RAV

customer_reviews.title: Cheap leash / Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. You can find other boards of higher quality for the same price. Leash is very short and looks like it would fit a 5 year olds wrist. We had to change out the leash and put on an old one from an older board just to be able to use this board.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after 10-12 uses
customer_reviews.text: The boogie board fell apart after about 12 uses. The sides started peeling off after the first week of use last year then the 2nd time we used it last week the top started peeing off. We only go to the beach 1 week per year and this did not even make it through the 2nd trip.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Savage

customer_reviews.title: Cracked in half first day
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't catch waves like it should. You should just get another board
customer_reviews.author: Living and Learning

customer_reviews.title: Had High Hopes
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this since it was so pricey. After just a few uses, the side strip came off. The board is still usable, I just fear that once the side completely comes off the rest of the board will start coming apart as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: My grandson used it less than two weeks and it broke in half.
customer_reviews.author: SheilaR

customer_reviews.title: good product. poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: dislike, I ordered this product bo toys bodyboard. when I received it. it wasn't packaged good at all and the board was damaged. very unsatisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: dave becker

customer_reviews.title: Light
customer_reviews.text: Nice size fun in the ocean. You do have to be careful where you store them because they will have dents.
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: Low quality board
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap low-quality board. No handels it's short and it's overpriced. the leash was extremely thin and cheap and didn't survive the first week of waves. Too much hassle to send it back so I'm out $30.
customer_reviews.author: Rose_NAME_NOT_RETURNED

customer_reviews.title: Bottom peels away.
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother!!! I bought 3 of these for my kids and after a few times in the ocean the bottom of 2 of them are peeling away.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: This body board held up in the ocean for the entirety of our beach trip!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Bunch

customer_reviews.title: Made well but...
customer_reviews.text: Well made but bleached in the sun so now our son who loves red but HATES PINK refuses to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ethyrea Fan!

customer_reviews.title: Good size for smaller children K - 4
customer_reviews.text: Solid. Attractive. Good size for smaller children K - 4. (from original 5 stars) Update The bottom of the boogie board peeled off after only 2 days in the ocean waves. Very disappointing since the size was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: looking for delight

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in less than a year - junk
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart in under a year :-( waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: My twin says it rocks around like a boat on the waves
customer_reviews.text: Bought this boogie board for my twin. He loves it and says it rocks on waves like a boat going through water.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: lightweight foam board WAY overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This board is lightweight foam that looks exactly like the cheap ones you get at the drug store. How are they charging so much for this basic board? Way overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Grandson used this on his Outer Banks vacation and loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Go
customer_reviews.text: Avoid at all costs. After 7-10 rides in the river, the bottom laminate began to separate and now is fully off. The side laminate began separating at about the same time. It’s useless now. Go elsewhere. Buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler T. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Fun, quality, product
customer_reviews.text: Decent price for a quality board. My kids and I love em. My daughter is only 50lbs and uses a 33 in, she can catch the tiniest wave and wide it all the way to the sand. Fun times
customer_reviews.author: Terrance J.

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy !
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged dents all over, not in box just in foil so looks allready used before you take off the plastic ! Poor shipment service , paid to much for it. DONT BUY !
customer_reviews.author: kvh

customer_reviews.title: they will come apart
customer_reviews.text: the grandkids left them out in the sun for a couple of days and they came apart at the seams. will try some glue to see if that works.
customer_reviews.author: David P Zeigler

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Made our trip to the beach great, my kiddo played with it entire time and she is 5'2
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Do not order this board. It fell apart with one day use at the beach. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hryb

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Board rides fine but the leash is very poor quality.....leash rendered totally useless after 2nd day at the beach.... wrist strap frayed first day and Velcro would not hold together...this board was a gift for my 4yr old granddaughter....
customer_reviews.author: FA

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the beach but the strap broke after 3x use
customer_reviews.text: Fun for the beach but the strap broke after 3x use
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was actually more sturdy than I was expecting and really light weight. My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on date stated, packaged securely (wasn't expecting that), color vibrant, sturdy, and held up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the $
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and the product in person is even better in quality than the picture captures;) SoCal Mom (buys a lot of boards)
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy- paint foam!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy!!!This wave board is cheap foam. It arrives with a sticker that says “ don’t place in direct sunlight”. That’s awful- this board is for the beach. It’s porous; it’s foam from a craft store that’s spray painted with a string.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with leash
customer_reviews.text: This is a great boogie board but it did not come with a leash like pictured/listed. My kids have already used it otherwise I’d return it. Would be great if amazon or the manufacturer would send a leash.
customer_reviews.author: jessica anderson

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk. I ordered 2 for my 2 boys age 4 and 6 and the completely fell apart the second time out.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great firm board
customer_reviews.text: Kids spent hours in the gulf on these boards having a great time with no flex and little wear.
customer_reviews.author: JT cos

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: When this board was opened on my grandson’s birthday the Velcro strap was already fraying & we expect that we’ll have to improvise something so he’ll be able to continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 8 year old girl. She loves it. Just what we have been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY ROMM

customer_reviews.title: Leash is not quality
customer_reviews.text: The strap is not very durable at all. Just a string with Velcro strap very small. If you want quality this is not quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: packaged perfectly and in excellent condition! Thank you Boy-Toys
customer_reviews.text: The boogie board was delivered as expected, packaged perfectly and in excellent condition! Thank you Boy-Toys!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crappy quality.
customer_reviews.text: Really unhappy with these boards. Just over a year with them and both 41” boards fell a part. We have them in Mexico sominky use them 3-4 times a year and kept them out of the sun. They really are crappy
customer_reviews.author: michael Gorenstein

customer_reviews.title: Leash came off after first swim, however my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: Leash came off after first swim, however my husband was able to fix it for now. White paint coming off as well
customer_reviews.author: Olya

customer_reviews.title: Good board
customer_reviews.text: Good solid board, my teen used it twice in the ocean and held up well. Packed well, happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 6 year old. It is light weight and has the handy strap so it does not get lost. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: like it would fall apart after one use
customer_reviews.text: Did not arrive w/ Leash, felt very cheap, like it would fall apart after one use. I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Not very durable. The leash easily cut through the board.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Otter

customer_reviews.title: These were for my grandchildren, and they were in ...
customer_reviews.text: These were for my grandchildren, and they were in the warehouse, so they were delivered ASAP. They took them to Corpus Christi vacation and had a blast. "They are beautiful" was my granddaughter's comment when they opened the box!
customer_reviews.author: Francene

customer_reviews.title: Good prices, good company
customer_reviews.text: Nice boards. I like the design. They didn't come with wrist leashes as advertised, but they sent them as soon as we asked, so all is good. Responsive & polite company to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Three Sisters

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The rope was cheaply made. Very weak. Also their was a little hole already in the boogie board brand new
customer_reviews.author: Charissa Palacios

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one I purchased good value, arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Saramandich

customer_reviews.title: Leash is junk, board is not high quality.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a little better quality board but the leash is junk. I had to buy a different leash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Bo-Toys Body Board Lightweight with EPS Core
product_meta.description: Body Board Lightweight with EPS core, Heat lamination Technology, offers impact strength durability, Lightweight & Rigid. More maneuverability, and increased speeds and strength. DURABLE CONSTRUCTION : HDPE (High Density Polyethylene) super slick bottom with channels and a crescent tail. Compact feeling and water resistant for all wave conditions. 60/40 rails allow for more maneuverability and skills. Includes leash with wristband to keep board nearby. 41" board, Stylish design, bright colors (red, blue and pink) for you to choose , offer best surfing fun.
